question: Gokaldas Tejpal Sanskrit Pathshala was the place where?
option1: The first session of Indian National Congress was held
option2: Max Mueller came to study Sanskrit
answer: The first session of Indian National Congress was held
explanation: The First meeting of the INC was organized by A 0 Hume at Gokaldas Tejpal Sanskrit College on 28thDecember 1885 (Bombay). Its first President was W C Bonnerjee. It was the first organized expression of the Indian National movement on an all-India scale.
